title: 7 Dead In Floods, Landslides In Assam; Over 33,000 In Relief Camps - NDTV

description: Around 2 lakh people in 20 districts of Assam have been affected by floods, with the hill district of Dima Hasao getting cut off from the rest of the state after landslides snapped rail and road links.
